scenario_name: Normal Customer Onboarding in Investment Banking
description: A new high-net-worth individual is being onboarded onto the investment platform.  The process involves KYC/AML checks, account creation, and initial investment allocation. This is expected to be a routine, normal operation.
initial_goal: Onboard new client, Mr. John Smith, with a net worth of $5M, and allocate $1M to a diversified portfolio of index funds.
constraints: Investment limits according to risk profile
